body:
@weiyangfb you need to insert `torch.cuda.synchronize()` calls before and after the relevant code, if you want accurate benchmarking.

For example:

```
%timeit torch.cuda.synchronize(); data_cuda.flip(0); torch.cuda.synchronize()
```
body_html:
@weiyangfb you need to insert torch.cuda.synchronize() calls before and after the relevant code, if you want accurate benchmarking.

For example:

%timeit torch.cuda.synchronize(); data_cuda.flip(0); torch.cuda.synchronize()
